title: news.com.au — Australia’s #1 news site
text: Shadow Finance Minister Katy Gallagher says the government needs to “acknowledge that there are problems in the economy”. Governor of the Reserve Bank, Philip Lowe said “The economy has been through a very soft patch over the past year, but it is actually gradually improving”. Ms Gallagher told Sky News there has been “significant negative economic data since the election” and Labor’s greatest “concern is that growth is the lowest it’s been in a decade”. “The government hasn’t really outlined an economic plan for Australia” and there are steps it could be taking “that will improve confidence in the economy,” she said. Image: News Corp Australia
